sentences.english: We should pay attention to synonym discrimination.
sentences.chinese: 我们应注意对同义词的辨析。

sentences.english: The judge distinguished between many cases.
sentences.chinese: 该法官对许多案件进行辨析。
一部常用同义词辨析词典。

sentences.english: The results of removing the extreme values were similar to those in data transformation.
sentences.chinese: 极值剔除后的热点辨析结果与数据转换后的结果类似。

sentences.english: The students can make sentences with words in 1a.
sentences.chinese: 通过单词分类进一步提高学生的辨析能力。

sentences.english: Even though these are trivial problems, there is a great necessity to make a distinction.
sentences.chinese: 这些问题尽管是白璧微瑕，但也有辨析的必要。

sentences.english: Chapter 1 involves examining the origin and development of Matchmaker.
sentences.chinese: 第一章重在探讨“媒妁”的源流辨析问题。

sentences.english: This text differentiates and analyses the modality adverbs which have same form but belong to different category.
sentences.chinese: 文章对《世说新语》的同形异类语气副词进行辨析。

sentences.english: The importance of near-synonym discrimination in English learning cannot be neglected.
sentences.chinese: 同义词辨析在英语学习中是个不容忽视的重点。

sentences.english: In chapter one, I will distinguish two group of definition, define the exterior of research.
sentences.chinese: 第一章着重辨析两组基本概念，从而界定研究的范围。

sentences.english: The author attempts to address this issue by analyzing some examples of this phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 文章就此类音义错位现象选例作一些辨析。

sentences.english: The paper throws light on the similarities and differences of words of color in metaphor between English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 辨析了汉语和英语中颜色词喻意的异同。

definition: true or false?/correct or incorrect/to correct errors (in a document)
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
the subject under discussion/the point at issue
